Question.Subject: where to report inappropriate websites?
Question.Content: I heard of this website where people take videos of animals heads being chopped off and things of that nature and upload the videos to their website, and I feel like that is very disgusting and wrong. I am wondering if there is a way for me to report the website, but I don't know who exactly I would tell.
Question.ChosenAnswer:
If the website does illegal stuff, you can check out this website, it explains a little bit: http://www.media-awareness.ca/english/resources/special_initiatives/wa_resources/wa_shared/backgrounders/reporting_internet_content.cfm
I also heard that police departments usually have a non emergency number you can call to report it.

Answer.Content:
If the website does illegal stuff, you can check out this website, it explains a little bit: http://www.media-awareness.ca/english/resources/special_initiatives/wa_resources/wa_shared/backgrounders/reporting_internet_content.cfm
I also heard that police departments usually have a non emergency number you can call to report it.
